description:
Photo Wall is about composing amazing collages and cards to share your birthdays, holidays, anniversaries and more. Photo Wall comes loaded with hand crafted layouts of various themes to get you started. Choose a layout, add your photos and watch your masterpiece come to life in just a few seconds.

- A library of  pre-included fully customisable layouts, backgrounds and stickers to choose from. 
- Additional layouts and content packs available to purchase from Photo Wall Store. 
- Photo filters and crop to get that perfect look. Custom slider controls for Pro users to retouch photos. 
- Simple tools to add borders and backgrounds or adjust drop shadow to add that wow factor to your compositions.
- Complete your collage with your very own custom messages. Choose your favorite font and adjust the text style. 
- Directly upload to Facebook, Twitter and Flickr or share via Instagram, Email and others. 
- Print and save your collages high quality. Photo Wall supports up to 8 MP export.
- Ship your creation as a Postcard to your friends and family.  

Advanced project management automatically saves your work when you start a new project or switch between them. You can also send your collage in editable format via Email or AirDrop. It’s also possible to backup your projects to Dropbox for future. 

An intuitive yet powerful user interface makes everything a breeze to use. Composing amazing photo collages had never been easier. Just in case you feel lost, you can look up the help or contact us.

Save, savor and share your precious memories with Photo Wall.
trackCensoredName: Photo Wall HD - Collage App for iPad
trackName: Photo Wall HD - Collage App for iPad
releaseNotes:
We recommend "Photo Wall - Collage App" which is universal app for new users. Photo Wall HD is to support existing iPad users of Photo Wall.

- All new iOS 8 compatible slick UI
- All new Logo
- Hand crafted fully customisable Layouts to help you create awesome collages and cards
- New Barber and Accessory sticker packs
- Sharing to Instagram and others
- Filters to enhance your photos and give them timeless look
- Use photos from Photo Stream
